item.title: Fine-tuning OpenAI's GPT-2 to generate fake DJ biographies
item.description: For fun, I wanted to see if I could fine-tune OpenAI’s GPT-2 model to generate DJ and electronic musician biographies. Although it’s only my opinion, it performed impressively. With only a modest amount of training, the model’s output gets close to the source material.

item.title: Hello, world
item.description: It is customary to write some filler for an inaugural post on a blog, and here is my contribution to that time-honoured tradition. The pages of this site are intended to filled with musings about personal projects and thoughts relating to data science.

item.title: about
item.description: This site is intended to cover a range projects and ideas relating to my work and personal interests. Professionally, I’m a principal data scientist with experience leading projects across industries and problem spaces, solving problems from implementing data-informed decision making to innovating with AI.
